creditline: Gift of David Laird and Helen Lauritzen Laird
description: stylized head wearing a black and white lobed (feathered?) headdress, with white "face", black triangular "mouth", two triangles representing hair on forehead, turquoise and coral elements at top of head on "headdress" and pair of turquoise drops on either side of head (drops in front of ears of headdress?); bar pin on back with safety latch closure
title: Pin, from a three-piece set
